Page replaces Google CEO Eric Schmidt , who will become executive chairman. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said Page would "merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly." I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Eric Schmidt wrote. "Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead."
